changelogFull:
v4.2
 - Fixed app crashing when trying to import scripts from some locations.
 - Miscellaneous changes.

v4.1
 - Completely removed Ads from the app.
 - Switched to use Material Alert Dialogs.
 - Added donation option.
 - Miscellaneous changes.

v4.0
 - Re-built from (nearly) scratch.
 - App should be now much more fast.
 - Cleaned a whole lot of unused code.
 - Miscellaneous changes.

v3.5
 - Fixed some issues on Create script.
 - Miscellaneous changes.

v3.4
 - Fixed various issues on Edit, create and apply script.
 - Miscellaneous changes.

v3.7
 - Introduced new page to explain no root status.
 - Miscellaneous changes.

v3.6
 - Improved Ad Layout.
 - Removed unnecessary copyright text.
 - Miscellaneous changes.

v3.5
 - Fixed some issues on Create script.
 - Miscellaneous changes.

v3.4
 - Fixed various issues on Edit, create and apply script.
 - Miscellaneous changes.

v3.3
 - Update script Edit and Details views.
 - Updated libsu to v3.0.2.
 - Update gradle build tools.
 - Miscellaneous changes.

v3.2
 - Update description view (Each and every task on scripts are now more straight forward).
 - Added Russian translation (Credits: Mikesew1320).
 - Add an Auto-Mode to App Theme.
 - Improved About and Change-logs view.
 - Miscellaneous Changes.

v3.1
 - Apply and Test script: Show success message if the output is empty 
 - Fixed crashing in no root available situations.
 - Barnd new About & Change-log views.
 - Miscellaneous Changes.

v3.0
 - Removed a bunch of unused code.
 - Removed interstitial ads from app.
 - Replace toast messages with snackbar.
 - Miscellaneous changes.

v2.9
 - Largely improved app user interface.
 - Improved root handling.
 - Added portuguese (brazilian) translations (Credits: @Lennoard).
 - Miscellaneous changes.

v2.8
 - Improved apply & test script options.
 - Miscellaneous changes.

v2.7
 - Migrated to libsu (@Lennoard).
 - Added option to test a script while creating/editing.
 - Brand New applying script view.
 - Allow editing copyright text by long-clicking.
 - Miscellaneous changes.

v2.6
 - Added Greek translations (credits: @tsiflimagas).
 - Miscellaneous changes.

v2.5
 - Added dark & light themes.
 - Added an option to change app language.
 - Fixed creating app folder on Android 10.
 - Added Indonesian (credits: @okta-10) and Amharic (credits: @Mikesew1320) translations.
 - Improved Korean translations (credits: @SmgKhOaRn).
 - Updated build tools & dependencies.
 - Miscellaneous changes.

v2.4
 - res: Added Korean translations (credits @SmgKhOaRn).
 - Main: Updated App UI.
 - Misc: Overall code cleaning and quality improvements.

v2.3
 - Main: Disable Ads if SmartPack Donation Package is installed.
 - Main: App Theme: Make it more Dark.
 - gradle: Update build tools & dependencies.
 - Miscellaneous changes.

v2.2
 - Main: Exit app only after pressing back button twice (prevent accidental closing).
 - Misc: Improved no-root message.
 - gradle: Updated build tools.
 - Miscellaneous changes.

v2.1
 - Main: Improved overall coding style.
 - Miscellaneous Changes.

v2.0
 - Scripts: Import: Updated to work with default Documents UI.
 - res: Brand new icons.
 - Miscellaneous Changes.

v1.8
 - Fixed crashing on some devices.
 - Miscellaneous Changes.

v1.7
 - Preparations for PlayStore release.
 - Misc: Updated example scripts.
 - Main: Added a simple banner Ad view at the bottom.
 - Miscellaneous Changes.

beta_v6
 - File picking: Support more file manager apps.
 - Main: Slightly updated dark theme.
 - Misc: Overall improvements and bug fixes.
 - Miscellaneous Changes.

beta_v5
 - Script: Main: Switched to Dark black theme.
 - Miscellaneous Changes.

beta_v4
 - Script: Added option to directly share scripts.
 - Scripts: Added a helper message, if the item list is empty.
 - Updated targetSdkVersion to 29 (Q).
 - Miscellaneous Changes.

beta_v3
 - Script Manager: Added a welcome message with examples.
 - App update: fully r-written & switched to json base.
 - Scripts: Import scripts: Fix importing from sdcard root folder.
 - Miscellaneous Changes.

alpha_v2
 - Scripts: On-boot: Add choice to select post-fs or late_service.
 - Script: Edit Script: Show an alert dialog if On-boot is already enabled.
 - Miscellaneous Changes.

alpha_v1
 - The very first public release of Script Manager, an app to create, import, edit and easily execute any properly formatted shell scripts.
